page.title: 12LIFE STYLES
page.content:
Rev. Richard Carhill The church is between 600 & 800 years old.It was built in the 12th to 14th centuary but since then it has been renovated.Richard Carhill the {vicar}of Littlebury church has lived in Littlebury for two years,he moved to Littlebury because he thinks it is a nice village and because the church was vacant.He also moved there because he could be near a place to shop, (Saffron Walden or Cambridge).
Saffron Walden is 2 miles away. Cambridge is 15 miles away.
{Landlord}of Queen's Head Pud
"We've been living here for 26 years and we moved here because we could use the pub as a house and for trade"
